record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 0 Width = 0 Height = 0 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Height = 599 Width = 984 DoCreate = .T. AutoCenter = .T. Caption = "Form" AllowOutput = .F. Name = "_form1"
Top = 564 Left = 768 Height = 27 Width = 96 Caption = "Async=TRUE" Name = "Command2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* CHECK Thisform.winhttp1.ONRESPONSESTART, ONRESPONSEDATAVAILABLE, ONRESPONSEFINISHED
Local lcurl, lnsize
m.lcurl = 'http://javadl.sun.com/webapps/download/AutoDL?BundleId=107943'
*!* GET FILE SIZE
Thisform.winhttp1.Open('HEAD', m.lcurl)
Thisform.winhttp1.Send()
m.lnsize = Val(Thisform.winhttp1.GetResponseHeader('Content-Length'))
*!* ADD SOME PROPERTIES
Thisform.winhttp1.AddProperty('bytestotal', m.lnsize) Thisform.winhttp1.AddProperty('bytesdone', 0)
*!* GET THE FILE
Thisform.winhttp1.Open('GET', m.lcurl, .T.) Thisform.winhttp1.Send()
ENDPROC

PROCEDURE onresponsedataavailable Lparameters pData
This.BytesDone = This.BytesDone + Len(m.pData)
Thisform.Caption = 'Total: ' + This._formatbytesize(This.BytesTotal) + ' Done: ' + Transform(Round(100 * This.BytesDone / This.BytesTotal, 0)) + '%'
DoEvents
ENDPROC PROCEDURE onresponsefinished ?'ONRESPONSEFINISHED'
ENDPROC PROCEDURE onresponsestart Lparameters pStatus, pContentType
?'ONRESPONSESTART', m.pStatus, m.pContentType, This._justfname(This.option_url) ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 468 Left = 768 Height = 27 Width = 96 Caption = "Async=TRUE" Name = "Command1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *!* CHECK Thisform.winhttp1.ONRESPONSESTART, ONRESPONSEDATAVAILABLE, ONRESPONSEFINISHED
Local lcurl, lnsize
m.lcurl = 'https://voat.co/'
*!* ADD SOME PROPERTIES
Thisform.winhttp1.AddProperty('bytestotal', m.lnsize) Thisform.winhttp1.AddProperty('bytesdone', 0)
*!* GET THE FILE
Thisform.winhttp1.Open('GET', m.lcurl, .f.) Thisform.winhttp1.Send()
_cliptext = Thisform.winhttp1.getallresponseheaders()
ENDPROC
